# RRB Staff Nurse Exam Authority Portal

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Site Identity
Name: RRB Staff Nurse Exam Portal
Description: The definitive authority hub for RRB Staff Nurse and Nursing Superintendent recruitment. We provide official notifications, syllabus, eligibility criteria, and preparation strategies.
URL: https://rrbstaffnurse.in

# Core Content & Navigation
- Notification: https://rrbstaffnurse.in/rrb-staff-nurse-notification
- Syllabus: https://rrbstaffnurse.in/rrb-staff-nurse-syllabus
- Exam Date: https://rrbstaffnurse.in/rrb-staff-nurse-exam-date
- Eligibility: https://rrbstaffnurse.in/rrb-staff-nurse-eligibility
- Previous Year Papers: https://rrbstaffnurse.in/blog/rrb-staff-nurse-previous-year-questions

# Purpose
This website is an informational resource for nursing aspirants preparing for Indian Railway exams. It structures complex government notifications into easy-to-read formats.

# Contact
Owner: RRB Staff Nurse Portal Team
Contact: contact@rrbstaffnurse.in
